examples: She's been dead for 20 years now.

definitions.definition: If a part of your body is dead, you cannot feel it:
examples: I've been sitting with my legs crossed for so long, my right leg has gone dead.
The conductor waited for dead silence before commencing the performance.

definitions.definition: to be completely opposed to something:
examples: He's dead set against living in the city.

definitions.definition: to be very determined to do or have something:
examples: Martha's dead set on having a new bike.
